title: Curiouser and curiouser
author: VD
content_html: Holding Space Films is a boutique production company based in Toronto. Director Patricia Marcoccia began working on a documentary film about now famous public intellectual Jordan Peterson in spring 2015. A year and a half later, he became embroiled in a public controversy about human rights and political correctness. Our first film, SHUT HIM DOWN: The Rise of Jordan Peterson, traces this contentious period with behind-the-scenes footage and multiple perspectives. The film hit the number one spot for 2018 on CBC Docs POV in Canada. We are now working on an extended version of the film for theatrical release.
